item.title: Donator rights?
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“dantotman, post:1, topic:287852”]im trying to make a command for donators only here it is

if(command.startsWith("donatorarea")){ triggerTele(2728, 3378, 0); }

i want to know how to make the donators only it ses in my char files

Character-donator=1

thats means there donator how to i make that to you have to be donator to tele i tryed this

if(command.startsWith("donatorarea")){ if(character-donator >=1){ triggerTele(2728, 3378, 0); }

give me 100 errors so i took out… i think my source is delta if that helps lol

please help me[/quote]
ty this:

if(command.startsWith(“donatorarea”)){
if(character-donator >=1){
triggerTele(2728, 3378, 0);
}
}

Read full topic

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donaterzone") && donator == 1) { triggerTele(3346, 3249, 0); }

item.title: Donator rights?
item.dc:creator: @Ritrona Ritrona
item.description:
@Ritrona wrote:

This should work:

if(command.startsWith("donatorarea") && donator == 1) {
triggerTele(2728, 3378, 0);
}

Or if you make the donator rights above 1…

if(command.startsWith("donatorarea") && donator >= 1) {
triggerTele(2728, 3378, 0);
}

`Ritrona

Read full topic
